author: Casey Scheld
title: Persona 3 Reload Opening Movie Released
text:
News
Persona 3 Reload Opening Movie Released
Featuring the new track “Full Moon Full Life!”, get a taste of Atlus West and SEGA’s Persona 3 Reload with the opening movie of the game.
A remake of 2006’s JRPG Persona 3, Persona 3 Reload will feature updated character designs, different graphical and functional updates, and new music.
All those interested can watch the Persona 3 Reload opening movie below:
Persona 3 Reload — Opening Movie | Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows PC
Players won’t have to wait long to climb Tartarus; Persona 3 Reload will come out for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC on February 2.
Pre-orders for both the Digital and Physical versions of the game can be found on
the official Persona 3 Reload website. When it comes to the digital version of the game, a Digital Standard, Digital Deluxe, and Digital Premium version of Persona 3 Reload exists.
In the case of the Digital Premium version, items include the Base Game, the P3G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus), the Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack, a Digital Artbook, and a Digital Soundtrack.
